/-- Helper: cos(x) expressed using complex exponentials -/
private lemma cos_as_exp (x : ℝ) :
    Real.cos x = ((Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))) / 2).re := by
  have h1 : (Complex.exp (↑x * Complex.I)).re = Real.cos x := Complex.exp_ofReal_mul_I_re x
  rw [← h1, Complex.add_re, Complex.div_re]
  congr 1
  have h_two_cos : 2 * Complex.cos (x : ℂ) = Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) := by
    rw [Complex.two_cos]
    congr 1
    · rw [mul_comm]
    · congr 1
      ring
  simp only [Complex.ofReal_re, Complex.ofReal_im, Complex.zero_im]
  have : (Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))).re = (Complex.exp (x * Complex.I)).re := by
    have : Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) = Complex.exp (↑(-x) * Complex.I) := by
      congr 1
      push_cast
      ring
    rw [this, Complex.exp_ofReal_mul_I_re]
    exact Real.cos_neg x ▸ rfl
  rw [this]
  ring

   455→/-- Helper: cos(x) expressed using complex exponentials -/

   457→    Real.cos x = ((Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))) / 2).re := by
   458→  have h1 : (Complex.exp (↑x * Complex.I)).re = Real.cos x := Complex.exp_ofReal_mul_I_re x

   460→  congr 1
   461→  have h_two_cos : 2 * Complex.cos (x : ℂ) = Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) := by
   462→    rw [Complex.two_cos]
   463→    congr 1

/-- Helper: cos(x) expressed using complex exponentials -/
private lemma cos_as_exp (x : ℝ) :
    Real.cos x = ((Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))) / 2).re := by
  have h1 : (Complex.exp (↑x * Complex.I)).re = Real.cos x := Complex.exp_ofReal_mul_I_re x
  rw [← h1]
  congr 1
  have h_two_cos : 2 * Complex.cos (x : ℂ) = Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) := by
    rw [Complex.two_cos]
    congr 1
    · rw [mul_comm]
    · congr 1
      ring
  rw [← h_two_cos]
  ring
toolUseResult.newString:
/-- Helper: cos(x) expressed using complex exponentials -/
private lemma cos_as_exp (x : ℝ) :
    Real.cos x = ((Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))) / 2).re := by
  have h1 : (Complex.exp (↑x * Complex.I)).re = Real.cos x := Complex.exp_ofReal_mul_I_re x
  rw [← h1, Complex.add_re, Complex.div_re]
  congr 1
  have h_two_cos : 2 * Complex.cos (x : ℂ) = Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) := by
    rw [Complex.two_cos]
    congr 1
    · rw [mul_comm]
    · congr 1
      ring
  simp only [Complex.ofReal_re, Complex.ofReal_im, Complex.zero_im]
  have : (Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))).re = (Complex.exp (x * Complex.I)).re := by
    have : Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) = Complex.exp (↑(-x) * Complex.I) := by
      congr 1
      push_cast
      ring
    rw [this, Complex.exp_ofReal_mul_I_re]
    exact Real.cos_neg x ▸ rfl
  rw [this]
  ring

/-
