/-- Helper: Power of sum using binomial theorem in Complex -/
private lemma exp_add_exp_pow (x : ℂ) (j : ℕ) :
    (Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))) ^ j =
    ∑ r ∈ Finset.range (j + 1), (j.choose r : ℂ) *
      Complex.exp ((2 * r - j : ℤ) * x * Complex.I) := by
  rw [Commute.add_pow (Commute.all _ _)]
  apply Finset.sum_congr rfl
  intro r hr
  have hr_le : r ≤ j := by
    simp only [Finset.mem_range] at hr
    omega
  -- LHS: x^r * y^(j-r) * choose(j,r)
  -- RHS: choose(j,r) * exp((2r-j)*x*I)
  -- Rearrange to group exponentials together
  calc Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) ^ r * Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) ^ (j - r) * (j.choose r : ℂ)
      = (Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) ^ r * Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I)) ^ (j - r)) * (j.choose r : ℂ) := by ring
    _ = Complex.exp (r * (x * Complex.I)) * Complex.exp ((j - r) * (-(x * Complex.I))) * (j.choose r : ℂ) := by
        have h1 : Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) ^ r = Complex.exp (r * (x * Complex.I)) := by
          rw [← Complex.exp_nat_mul]
        rw [h1]
        congr 2
        rw [← Complex.exp_nat_mul]
    _ = Complex.exp (r * (x * Complex.I)) * Complex.exp (((j : ℂ) - (r : ℂ)) * (-(x * Complex.I))) * (j.choose r : ℂ) := by
        congr 2
        congr 1
        rw [Nat.cast_sub hr_le]
    _ = Complex.exp (r * (x * Complex.I) + ((j : ℂ) - (r : ℂ)) * (-(x * Complex.I))) * (j.choose r : ℂ) := by
        rw [← Complex.exp_add]
    _ = Complex.exp (((2 * r - j : ℤ) : ℂ) * x * Complex.I) * (j.choose r : ℂ) := by
        congr 2
        push_cast
        ring
    _ = (j.choose r : ℂ) * Complex.exp (((2 * r - j : ℤ) : ℂ) * x * Complex.I) := by ring
input.new_string:
/-- Helper: Power of sum using binomial theorem in Complex -/
private lemma exp_add_exp_pow (x : ℂ) (j : ℕ) :
    (Complex.exp (x * Complex.I) + Complex.exp (-(x * Complex.I))) ^ j =
    ∑ r ∈ Finset.range (j + 1), (j.choose r : ℂ) *
      Complex.exp ((2 * r - j : ℤ) * x * Complex.I) := by
  rw [Commute.add_pow (Commute.all _ _)]
  apply Finset.sum_congr rfl
  intro r hr
  have hr_le : r ≤ j := by
    simp only [Finset.mem_range] at hr
    omega
  -- LHS has: exp(xI)^r * exp(-xI)^(j-r) * choose(j,r)
  -- RHS has: choose(j,r) * exp((2r-j)*xI)
  rw [← Complex.exp_nat_mul (n := r), ← Complex.exp_nat_mul (n := j - r)]
  rw [← Complex.exp_add]
  rw [mul_comm]
  congr 1
  -- Show: r * (x * I) + (j - r) * (-(x * I)) = (2 * r - j) * x * I
  simp only [Nat.cast_sub hr_le]
  ring

import Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Chebyshev
import Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.Trigonometric.Chebyshev
import Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Vieta
import Mathlib.Algebra.BigOperators.Field

import Mathlib.RingTheory.MvPolynomial.Symmetric.Defs
